name: Vaccination Scheduler for Radiology
description: Vaccination Scheduler for Radiology clusters progress notes and summarizes trial registries; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via Order Entry to improve time-to-treatment.

steps.name: Case Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize eligibility files from Care Management; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: API Discovery
steps.description: Execute api discovery phase for the Tool-Use pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Tool Execution
steps.description: Execute tool execution phase for the Tool-Use pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Triage
steps.description: Triage across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Intervention
steps.description: Intervention across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Eligibility Match
steps.description: Eligibility Match across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Optimization
steps.description: Optimization across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Documentation
steps.description: Documentation across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Orchestration
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to PACS; return response JSON for the client.
